text: isi namma xaltani Reedâ qarkaytol fayya heeh, isi xaquk ken daffeyse, kay xaltanii kee kay tooboko konnabaay massakaxxah sujuuduh kaah radde, Nabii Yuusuf isi abbak : yabbaw ama sujuud anu duma qunxuk suge saaku kol maaqe soonoh fidgay yi Rabbi numma abe kinni kaak iyye, nummah yi Rabbi casbik bukku yoo heeh sin barrik bahha hee waqdi yoh yemqeh, yoo kee yi toobokô fan sheytan yoysommeek gamadal, diggah yi Rabbi isih faxam caalih xabcinuk arac xagsa, diggah usuk ixxiga li abaamal naggaar kinni
